Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory727.jpg'}

{3: 'The sound of a bell continues to linger in the mountain valleys. The previously faint and muffled chimes have now become distinct, possibly because the two have passed the halfway point of the mountain.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: 'This... is the fourth time.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The sky begins to darken. The vegetation thriving at the foothills gradually turns from a lush green to a subdued gray-yellow as they ascend.'}

{3: "After breaking out of the looped passage near the mountain's midpoint, Hanying sees brand new paths continue to appear ahead of herself, leading the two into a landscape painted in autumnal hues of yellow and red."}
{3: 'Along with new pathways, endless streams of mechanoids also appear out of nowhere to hinder the travelers.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Spooner', 3: 'The bell is probably a sound signal that someone is using to control these mechanoids.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Enveloping the wooden passage are clouds of snow-white mist. A thousand-tree woodland stands ahead, yet all are withered and rotting.'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: 'Funny how fighting in a virtual world can actually tire you out, huh...?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Do you need to rest?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Spooner', 3: "I'm fine, but we've been coming a few hundred meters up since we left that place we hadn't been able to get out of, no?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: "God only knows just how much longer it's going to take before we reach the peak...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: 'According to the info we received when we left, this mountain is a two-thousander.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Spooner', 3: "Which means we've only come halfway.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: "Yes, but it's been about half a day since we got here.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Hanying has been on edge since they ran into the man.'}
{3: '"They" are interested in her.'}
{3: 'Why did "The Cradle" try to bait Yoyo into coming here?'}
{3: 'From within her memory chip, her past pains her.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory551.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Because it was on that fateful day years ago that "The Cradle" threatened Yoyo into carrying out that contemptible mission.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cgqz3002.jpg'}
{3: "And that's what cost Yoyo her memoryâ€”along with her right as a human being, turning her into a Construct."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory727.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: 'This is going nowhere...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Dong... dong... dong...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Spooner', 3: "No, Hanying. There isn't... around you... Watch out...", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxTongyong/FxUiGuanbixiaoshi.prefab', 2: '2', 4: '1'}
{3: "Spooner's body gradually dwindles as it disintegrates into lines of data, leaving the sound of a few fragmented words."}
{3: 'Hanying tries to no avail to get hold of the disappearing Spooner...'}
{3: 'And with it, she sees that her hand is disappearing in the setting sun, too.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'This sure is going nowhere.'}
{2: '???', 3: "Which is why I'm here to give you a boost."}
{2: '???', 3: 'Now, you only have yourselves to count on to find the answer to your question...'}
